00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace analysis {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// analyzes a rectangular region of m/z-time space 
00037 class RegionAnalyzer : public MSDataAnalyzer
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     struct Config
00042     {
00043         std::pair<double,double> mzRange;
00044         std::pair<size_t,size_t> indexRange;
00045         std::pair<int,int> scanNumberRange;
00046         std::pair<double,double> rtRange;
00047         bool dumpRegionData;
00048         std::string filenameSuffix;
00049 
00050         Config();
00051     };
00052 
00053     RegionAnalyzer(const Config& config, const MSDataCache& cache);
00054 
00055     struct SpectrumStats
00056     {
00057         double sumIntensity;
00058         MZIntensityPair max;  // sample point with highest intensity
00059         MZIntensityPair peak; // interpolated peak
00060 
00061         SpectrumStats();
00062     };
00063 
00064     const std::vector<SpectrumStats>& spectrumStats() const;
00065 
00066     struct Stats
00067     {
00068         size_t nonzeroCount; // # spectra with sumIntensity > 0
00069         double sum_sumIntensity;
00070         double sum_peak_intensity;
00071 
00072         // intensity-weighted peak statistics
00073         double mean_peak_mz;
00074         double variance_peak_mz;
00075         double sd_peak_mz; // standard deviation
00076 
00077         // index of peak with highest intensity
00078         size_t indexApex;
00079 
00080         Stats();
00081     };
00082 
00083     const Stats& stats() const;
00084 
00085 
00086     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00087     //@{
00088     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00089 
00090     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00091                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00092 
00093     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00094                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00095 
00096     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00097     //@}
00098 
00099     private:
00100     struct Impl;
00101     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00102     RegionAnalyzer(RegionAnalyzer&);
00103     RegionAnalyzer& operator=(RegionAnalyzer&);
00104 };
